list.title: $3DTemporalBatchTable
list.description: Verifies the integrity and stores the data corresponding to the batch table part of the 3DTiles_temporal extension.

list.title: $3DTemporalBoundingVolume
list.description: Verifies the integrity and stores the data corresponding to the bounding volume part of the 3DTiles_temporal extension.

list.title: $3DTemporalTileset
list.description: A constructor function that creates a new object.

list.title: $3DTemporalTransaction
list.description: The constructor function is a special function that is called when an object is created from a class

list.title: $3DTemporalTransactionAggregate
list.description: It's a constructor for the Aggregate class

list.title: $3DTemporalVersion
list.description: It takes a JSON object as input, and returns a JSON object that can be used by the graph window

list.title: AssetManager
list.description: Initialize the native render data.

list.title: AudioController
list.description: Audio component controller

list.title: BaseMap
list.description: Manages multiple WMS sources used as Itowns ColoLayer for background

list.title: CameraPositioner
list.description: Creates a CameraPositioner

list.title: CommandController
list.description: Add/remove native command controls

list.title: ContributeModule
list.description: Constructs a new contribute module.

list.title: ContributeService
list.description: Creates a contribute service.

list.title: D3GraphCanvas
list.description: Create a new D3 graph from an RDF JSON object. Adapted from https://observablehq.com/@d3/force-directed-graph#chart and https://www.d3indepth.com/zoom-and-pan/

list.title: Document
list.description: Creates a new document.

list.title: DocumentCommentsModule
list.description: Creates the document comments module. Creates a service and a comments window.

list.title: DocumentCommentsService
list.description: Creates a document comments service.

list.title: DocumentCommentsWindow
list.description: Creates a document comments window to add in the document browser.

list.title: DocumentCreationWindow
list.description: Creates a new document creation window.

list.title: DocumentFilter
list.description: Constructs a new document filter, from an acceptation function.

list.title: DocumentInspectorWindow
list.description: Constructs a documents inspector window.

list.title: DocumentModule
list.description: Creates a new documents module.

list.title: DocumentProvider
list.description: Constructs a new documents provider.

list.title: DocumentSearchFilter
list.description: Creates a new document search filter.

list.title: DocumentService
list.description: Constructs a new document service.

list.title: DocumentUpdateWindow
list.description: Creates a new document update window.

list.title: DocumentValidationModule
list.description: Creates the document validation module. Creates a validation service to manage HTTP requests, a validation source to change the retrieving URL and finally the view elements.

list.title: DocumentView
list.description: Creates a document view.

list.title: DocumentVisualizerWindow
list.description: Creates a new document image orienter.

list.title: DocumentsInValidationDocumentSource
list.description: Creates the document source.

list.title: DomElement3D
list.description: Composed of a {@link CSS3DObject} containing html and a {@link THREE.Object3D} superposing each other

list.title: DragAndDropAvatar
list.description: Drag and drop ui element in city to pass in avatar mode

list.title: ExternalScriptBase
list.description: Skeleton of a game context script, different {@link Context.EVENT} are trigger by {@link Context}

list.title: Frame3DBase
list.description: Basic Frame3D wrap different html element to handle CSS3D rendering {@link CSS3DRenderer}. It's possible to add {@link DomElement3D} to this. Composed with {@link THREE.Scene} + {@link THREE.PerspectiveCamera} + {@link THREE.WebGLRenderer}.

list.title: GeocodingService
list.description: Instantiates the geocoding service.

list.title: GeocodingView
list.description: Instantiates the view.

list.title: Graph
list.description: Create a new Table using D3.

list.title: GuidedTourController
list.description: Constructor for GuidedTourController The controller reads data from a database to build one or more guided tours Each guided tour is a succession of "steps" Each step has a document + tour text + doc text (steps are instances of the TourStep class) Multiple guided tours are supported (only one tour is finished for the demo) For the demo : options.preventUserFromChangingTour allows to hide the buttons for changing tour

list.title: InputManager
list.description: Manage user inputs with a poll system (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polling_(computer_science))

list.title: LoadingView
list.description: It creates a root HTML, then adds HTML elements for the loading bar.

list.title: MouseState
list.description: Poll system (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polling_(computer_science)) Listen to the MOUSE_STATE_EVENTS and store the mouse state to then be access synchronously

list.title: RenderController
list.description: Render component controller

list.title: RenderData
list.description: It takes an object3D and an optional animations object, and sets the object3D and animations properties of the object

list.title: RequestAnimationFrameProcess
list.description: A process based on the requestAnimationFrame native browser method

list.title: SlideShow
list.description: It initializes the widget.

list.title: SocketIOWrapper
list.description: Socket io client wrapper {@link https://www.npmjs.com/package/socket.io-client}, used to manage a websocket communication

list.title: SparqlEndpointResponseProvider
list.description: Creates a SPARQL Endpoint Provider

list.title: SparqlQueryWindow
list.description: Creates a SPARQL query window.

list.title: SparqlWorkspaceQueryWindow
list.description: Creates a SPARQL query window.

list.title: Table
list.description: Create a new Table using D3.

list.title: Target
list.description: Buffer object which store all data to keep following an object3D target

list.title: Temporal3DTilesLayerWrapper
list.description: A constructor that initializes a temporal style for a C3DTilesLayer by computing tile maps based on the 3DTILES_temporal batch table hierarchy content found in the tile content.

list.title: ValidationService
list.description: Constructs a validation service.

list.title: ValidationView
list.description: Creates the view.

list.title: Window
list.description: Creates a window.

list.title: WindowExtension
list.description: Create a new Window extension object.

list.title: AssetManagerConfig
list.description: Contains configs of assets.

list.title: BLANK_MATERIAL
list.description: Material making an "hole" in a {@link THREE.Scene} to see html css3D behind

list.title: DEFAULT_MATERIAL
list.description: Default material used by native objects

list.title: KEY
list.description: Some unique key to not collide with another item recorded in localStorage

list.title: MAPPING
list.description: Default mapping of controller

list.title: MOUSE_STATE_EVENTS
list.description: List of mouse event handle by MouseState

list.title: RenderDataConfig
list.description: Contains path, anchor, scale and rotation.

list.title: RequestService
list.description: Used by Widget.WebService Service used to make authentificate HTTP requests (with a token) Wiki : https://github.com/MEPP-team/UD-Viz/wiki/Request-Service#request-service

list.title: SoundsConfig
list.description: Contains path

list.title: URLSetCameraMatrix
list.description: Initialize camera matrix with url search params produced by appendCameraMatrixToURL

list.title: addLights
list.description: Add default lights to a scene 3D one directional and one ambient

list.title: appendCameraMatrixToURL
list.description: Append in search params of an url the camera matrix

list.title: appendWireframeByGeometryAttributeToObject3D
list.description: Traverse a THREE.Object3D and append in each Object3D children a THREE.LineSegment geometry representing its wireframe. Each wireframe geometry will keep the associated attribute value.

list.title: appendWireframeToObject3D
list.description: Traverse a THREE.Object3D and append in each Object3D children a THREE.LineSegment geometry representing its wireframe

list.title: bindLightTransform
list.description: Place the directional light in order its shadow camera fit the object

list.title: cameraFitRectangle
list.description: Move camera transform so the rectangle define by min & max (in the xy plane) fit the entire screen

list.title: checkParentChild
list.description: Check if an html element belong to another one recursively

list.title: colorSpace
list.description: Texture encoding used to have the right color of the .glb model + have an alpha channel

list.title: computeNearFarCamera
list.description: Compute near and far of camera in order to wrap a box define by a min and max value

list.title: computeRelativeElevationFromGround
list.description: Compute relative elevation from ground of a Object3D

list.title: createDisplayable
list.description: Create a button to toggle visibility of the content in a container

list.title: defaultConfigScene
list.description: Default scene 3D config

list.title: downloadImageOnDisk
list.description: Download an image on the local disk

list.title: downloadObjectAsJson
list.description: Download on the local disk an object as .json

list.title: fetchC3DTileFeatureWithNodeText
list.description: fetchC3DTileFeatureWithNodeText takes a parameter batchTableKey and returns a feature from a 3DTileslayer if the batch table content of the feature contains a given batchTableValue string in the given key. Returns an object containing the first matching feature and its layer.

list.title: focusC3DTilesLayer
list.description: Focus a C3DTiles Layer

list.title: focusCameraOn
list.description: Makes the camera move to focus on the target position.

list.title: getUriLocalname
list.description: Return the localname of a URI

list.title: getUriNamespace
list.description: Return the namespace of a URI

list.title: initRenderer
list.description: Initialize the webgl renderer with default values

list.title: initScene
list.description: Init scene 3D with {@link SceneConfig}

list.title: loadJSON
list.description: Request a json file on a distant server

list.title: loadMultipleJSON
list.description: Load multiples .json files

list.title: loadTextFile
list.description: Request a text file on a distant server

list.title: localStorageSetCameraMatrix
list.description: If there was a camera matrix recorded in localStorage restore it matrix world + when tab is closing record current camera matrix world /!\ calling this function make window reference the camera avoiding it to be GC and could cause memory leak You want to use this only when there is just one camera during the lifecycle of your application

list.title: localStorageSetVector3
list.description: If there was a vector 3 recorded in localStorage within the key passed copy values in vector3 + when tab is closing record current vector3 values /!\ calling this function make window reference the vector3 avoiding it to be GC and could cause memory leak

list.title: moveHtmlToWorldPosition
list.description: Modify left and top css attributes of your html element to place in scene3D

list.title: readFileAsGltf
list.description: change callback of an input file reading gltf

list.title: readSingleFileAsDataUrl
list.description: To be used with an input of type file

list.title: readSingleFileAsText
list.description: To be used with an input of type file

list.title: tokenizeURI
list.description: Tokenize a URI into a namespace and localname A uri is typically composed of a [namespace]#[localname] e.g. http://site.io/test#example_1 here the namespace is 'http://site.io/test#' and the localname is 'example_1'

list.title: windows
list.description: List of all registered windows.
